title: Graduate Assistant
desc: Produce Python code and visualizations with team to analyze company's price elasticity. Collaborate with professors and company representatives through weekly meetings.

title: Mathematics Specialist
desc: Apply positive reinforcement strategies during tutoring sessions with students who have learning disabilities in order to build both their math skills and confidence.

title: Private Mathematics Tutor
desc: Collaborated with students to complete and improve areas of weakness. Tutor high school and college students in Algebra, Geometry, Pre-Calculus, and Statistics course materials.

title: Assistant Learning Specialist
desc: Met weekly with students with learning disabilities to ensure they were completing all their coursework and submitting assignments on time. Additionally, maintained an updated record documenting all meetings and steps for each student.

title: Teaching Assistant
desc: Graded assignments and recorded scores in an organized manner. Scheduled and maintained regular office hours to meet with students.
